text: Celso Yunes Portiolli (born June 1, 1967) is a Brazilian television presenter and broadcaster. == Career == === TV shows=== {| class="wikitable" !Year !Show !TV station |- |1996 – 2000 |Passa ou Repassa | rowspan="16" |SBT |- |1997 – 1998 |Tempo de Alegria |- |1998 – 2001 |Xaveco |- |2000 |Fantasia |- |2001 – 2002 |Curtindo uma Viagem |- |2003 |O Conquistador do Fim do Mundo |- |2004 – 2006 |Sessão Premiada |- |2005 |Código Fama |- |2006 |Ver para Crer |- |2006 – 2007 |Charme |- |2007 |Namoro na TV |- |2007 |Curtindo com Reais |- |2007 |Curtindo com Crianças |- |2008 – 2009 |Campeonato de Perguntas |- |2009 – presente |Domingo Legal |- |2015 – 2017 |Sabadão com Celso Portiolli |} === Specials === {| class="wikitable" !Year !Program !TV station |- |1998 - present |Teleton | rowspan="4" |SBT |- |2011 - present |SBT Folia |- |2011 |Chaves: Especial de Natal |- |2011 |Chaves: Especial de Ano Novo |} ==References== == External links == * * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:People from Maringá Category:Brazilian people of Italian descent Category:Brazilian television presenters Category:Brazilian broadcasters
